wikipedia_page.main: Jimmy Brown (19July 1925 – 7 November 2008) was a Scottish football goalkeeper, who played for Heart of Midlothian, Kilmarnock, St Mirren, Stranraer and Falkirk in the Scottish Football League. He was also temporarily loaned to Southend and East Fife.Brown played for Scotland in every match of a tour of North America in 1949. The last match of the tour was against the United States, but the Scottish Football Association does not consider this match to be a full international.
